statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND country = 'USA';
SELECT username, preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender, country FROM user_profiles WHERE preferences->>'language' = 'English' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'USA' AND gender IN ('Male', 'Female') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age, gender, country FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND country LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE jsonb_array_length(preferences->'interests') > 3 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT username, email, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'Canada' AND gender IS NOT NULL ORDER BY email ASC, username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 18
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age < 30
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT user_id, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM user_profiles ORDER BY gender;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT u.user_id, u.name, c.campaign_id, c.preference_type FROM user_profiles u INNER JOIN campaign_preferences c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;

SELECT user_id, full_name, email, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'female';

SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM campaign_logs WHERE action IN ('click', 'view') ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
